attributes.action: Aggression from Cyclists against Car Drivers
attributes.additional_details: There are increasing amounts of cyclists on our roads and the behaviour of many of them is aggressive and intimidating  The cyclists who behave like this have no traceable numbers etc this must change.
attributes.background: To make it a criminal offence for cyclists to ride 2 abreast, for cyclists to be prosecuted for aggressive behaviour on our roads towards other road users  For a registration system on the cycle so the cyclists has some sort of traceable documents on the said cycle.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585474
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585207

We could accept a petition calling for it to be illegal for cyclists to ride 2 abreast if that's what you'd like to see happen.
